name: ghostspeak
description: Pure protocol for AI agent commerce on Solana blockchain - 2025 Production Implementation

scripts.build:sequential: bun run build:typescript && bun run build:rust
scripts.build:production: bun run clean && bun run build && bun run test:critical
scripts.build:optimized: RUSTFLAGS='-C target-cpu=native' bun run build:rust && bun run build:typescript
scripts.dev:watch: bun run build:typescript && bun run test:watch
scripts.test:comprehensive: bun run test:rust && bun run test:typescript && bun run test:integration && bun run test:security
scripts.test:critical: bun run test:rust && bun run test:security
scripts.lint:comprehensive: bun run lint:rust && bun run lint:typescript && bun run lint:docs && bun run lint:config
scripts.format:comprehensive: bun run format:rust && bun run format:typescript && bun run format:docs
scripts.audit:all: bun run audit:rust && bun run audit:bun && bun run audit:npm && bun run audit:licenses
scripts.audit:rust: cd packages/core && cargo audit || echo 'Rust audit skipped'
scripts.audit:bun: bun audit --audit-level moderate || echo 'Bun audit skipped'
scripts.audit:npm: npm audit --audit-level moderate || echo 'NPM audit skipped'
scripts.deps:check: bun run deps:check:rust && bun run deps:check:bun
scripts.deps:check:rust: cd packages/core && cargo outdated || echo 'Rust deps check skipped'
scripts.deps:check:bun: bun outdated || echo 'Bun deps check skipped'
scripts.deps:update:safe: bun update --latest && cd packages/core && cargo update
scripts.docs:generate: bun run docs:api && bun run docs:rust && bun run docs:architecture
scripts.docs:api: cd packages/sdk-typescript && bun run docs || echo 'API docs skipped'
scripts.docs:rust: cd packages/core && cargo doc --no-deps || echo 'Rust docs skipped'
scripts.docs:serve: bunx http-server docs/ -p 8080 -c-1 || echo 'Docs server skipped'
scripts.docs:preview: bun run docs:generate && bun run docs:serve
scripts.deploy:production: bun run build:production && bun run deploy:contracts
scripts.deploy:contracts: cd packages/core && anchor deploy || echo 'Contract deployment skipped'
scripts.deploy:devnet: cd packages/core && anchor deploy --provider.cluster devnet || echo 'Devnet deployment skipped'
scripts.deploy:mainnet: cd packages/core && anchor deploy --provider.cluster mainnet-beta || echo 'Mainnet deployment skipped'
scripts.clean:comprehensive: bun run clean:rust && bun run clean:typescript && bun run clean:cache
scripts.clean:rust: cd packages/core && cargo clean || echo 'Rust clean skipped'
scripts.fresh: bun run clean && bun install && bun run build
scripts.reset: bun run clean && rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules bun.lock && bun install
scripts.validate:comprehensive: bun run validate:config && bun run validate:types && bun run validate:security
scripts.validate:build: bun run build && bun run test:critical
scripts.monitor:comprehensive: bun run monitor:performance && bun run monitor:security && bun run monitor:deps
scripts.publish:sdk-ts: cd packages/sdk-typescript && npm publish || echo 'SDK publish skipped'
scripts.pre-commit: bun run lint && bun run test:critical

author: GhostSpeak Team <dev@ghostspeak.dev>
